body_html:
Hi @leido,

You would have to represent the newline character as "\n" (a 2 characters string). We chose the TSV format since it is well know, human-readable, and allows for white space in labels. If we get a big push on this, we will reconsider switching to another format.

Thanks for reporting this!

body:
Hi @leido,

You would have to represent the newline character as "\n" (a 2 characters string). We chose the TSV format since it is well know, human-readable, and allows for white space in labels. If we get a big push on this, we will reconsider switching to another format.

Thanks for reporting this!
